  - [Jazz Advice](https://www.jazzadvice.com/)

- **Youtube channels**
  - [Jens Larsen](https://www.youtube.com/c/JensLarsen)
  - [Rick Beato](https://www.youtube.com/c/RickBeato)
  - [JustinGuitar](https://www.youtube.com/c/justinguitar)
  - [RealBassLessons](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTLM0C5Acp-0xi4ZEb-mSQg)

- **Books/DVDs**
  - [Modal Jazz Composition & Harmony (Ron Miller)](https://www.jazzbooks.com/mm5/merchant.mvc?Screen=PROD&Product_code=MJCH)
  - [Chordability (Roni Ben-Hur)](https://www.jazzbooks.com/mm5/merchant.mvc?Screen=PROD&Store_Code=JAJAZZ&Product_Code=D1216&Category_Code=)
  - Fretboard Logic SE (Bill Edwards)

- **Paid Courses**
  - [TrueFire](https://truefire.com/online-guitar-lessons/)
  - [Discover Double Bass](https://discoverdoublebass.com/)

- **Software**
  - [Band In A Box](https://www.pgmusic.com/) - software for creating backing tracks
  - [Transcribe!](https://www.seventhstring.com/) - player for transcribing audio
  - [Guitar Pro](https://www.guitar-pro.com/) - notation software for guitar & other instruments
  - [Neck Diagrams](https://www.neckdiagrams.com/) - program to create neck diagrams for scales & chords
